item.title: EveryQuotes
item.description: Init date: 2024/03/31 “But man is not made for defeat," he said. “A man can be destroyed but not defeated.” ― Ernest Hemingway, The Old Man and the Sea Update date: 2024/04/01 “The brick walls are there for a reason. The brick walls are not there to keep us out. The brick walls are there to give us a chance to show how badly we want something. Because the brick walls are there to stop the people who don’t want it badly enough.

item.title: My First Post
